sections.heading: Overview
content: Dylan Brown, PharmD, is a pharmacist who works in drug information supporting health care professionals in their daily need for accurate clinical information. In his role, he provides curated drug information content to assist health care providers in making clinical decisions for their patients.
Brown earned his PharmD from the University of Georgia. In his free time, he is committed to using evidence-based medicine to support patients and health care providers in learning about medications.
